channel.title: Logging server
channel.description:
I went to login to my server, not knowing what I did wrong; Base is PI.
Errors: [code][10/27/10 8:02 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 [10/27/10 8:02 PM]: at server.util.Stream.readDWord(Stream.java:300) [10/27/10 8:02 PM]: at item.title: Logging server
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Post the Client.initialize method. You’re trying to read 4 bytes (readDWord()) from an array which is throwing the error. Basically you’re trying to access something that doesn’t exist

Read full topic
